WRITING.TITLE: Tickets Are Live in 10 minutes for the 9/16 LA show!

WRITING.TITLE: THE 1,000 SUBSCRIBERS GIVEAWAY!
WRITING.TEXT:
***Oh shit, Sung!***
In just under 6 months... we've hit our milestone of 1,000 Subscribers!
[**In celebration of so many cool, dedicated fans we're giving back to the community and hosting our first ever giveaway?!**](http://i.imgur.com/hfh9V6j.jpg)
I also want to take a moment to give a huge thanks to TWRP for so graciously providing us with some pretty sweet prizes!
**We'll be giving away 10 prizes of:**
* Signed Guardians of the Zone Poster
* The Guardians of the Zone EP
* Print of NSP/TWRP in Space
We've kept things pretty easy so in order to qualify for a prize all you have to do is answer these simple questions and ***submit your answer in the thread below!***
*1. Where would you like to see TWRP perform?*
*2. What song would you want to see TWRP cover?*
*3. What can we do to improve r/TWRP?*
*4. What is your favourite TWRP moment?*
Our only rules are to please only post in this thread ONCE, any duplicate messages will be removed. ____ Along with the giveaway, keep an eye out for some shiny, new flairs to be added to the sidebar! And as a reminder, there are only ***4 more days*** to [apply to our application to be a new mod in r/TWRP.](https://www.reddit.com/r/TWRP/comments/4uwr28/growing_the_mod_team_apply_to_be_a_mod_due_date/)
If you have any further questions feel free to shoot the mods a message. We're happy to help and we love to hear from you!
*Thanks everybody and good luck!* ___
**Contest Ends: AUGUST 20**
Noel Fielding's head is in my hands, haha...
Absolutely!! I definitely can! If you make an order there's a section at checkout that says "Notes". You can list whatever you want there :)
My experience is all based on the Toronto show but GEN was $35 and VIP was $70... hopefully that gives you a rough estimate?
Oh, I'm already set. I'll be at the Toronto show. Thanks anyway! ;)

For the 2 Toronto shows, VIP was gone within seconds, General Admission took about 15-20 minutes to sell out.
This Chicago show is an All Ages event so they might sell out even faster.
Haha, good luck! VIP was gone in seconds for the Toronto show.
Haha no worries! We also recently found out that TWRP stands for Teen Wolf Roleplay so you can imagine the plethora of irrelevant posts we see. :P

WRITING.TITLE: "I don't much care for Canadians." "You don't like TWRP?!"

WRITING.TEXT:
I haven't really thought about the Tup-Tups but that's an interesting inquiry!
I know some people are really into making TWRPsonas of themselves. Like, what kind of character they would be if they existed in that universe. Kind of similar?
I still find "Tup-Tup" equally embarrassingly as it is awesome.
